pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","h2",null,{"id":"收录架构","children":"收录架构"}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"MINGW: i686, x86_64, ucrt64, clang64"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"MSYS: i686, x86_64"}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"安装","children":"安装"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["请访问镜像目录下的 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"distrib/"}]," 目录"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"# x86_64
{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/distrib/x86_64/
# i686
{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/distrib/i686/"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["找到名为 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"msys2-<架构>-<日期>.exe"}]," 的文件（如 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"msys2-x86_64-20141113.exe"}],"），下载安装即可。"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"pacman-的配置","children":"pacman 的配置"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"直接运行"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"sed -i "s#https\?://mirror.msys2.org/#{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/#g" /etc/pacman.d/mirrorlist*","codeLanguage":"bash"}]]}]

meta.title: MSYS2 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
